snippet: Kraft Foods on Monday said it was revamping its macaroni-and-cheese meal to remove preservatives and synthetic colors.
abstract: Kraft Foods says it will revamp its macaroni-and-cheese meal to remove preservatives and synthetic colors, in effort to adhere to consumer demand for healthier-seeming brands.
lead_paragraph: Kraft Foods on Monday said it was revamping its macaroni-and-cheese meal to remove preservatives and synthetic colors.

headline.main: Kraft to Drop Preservatives From Its Macaroni and Cheese
headline.print_headline: Kraft to Drop Preservatives From Its Macaroni and Cheese
